body:
Comment 6: 
i don't know if cifs could be the problem, have you checked the permission of
src/pkg/syscall/zerrors_linux_arm.go in your original cifs-backed mount?

as i said earlier, if cmd/dist could build syscall package and then build go_bootstrap
successfully, i doubt that file has wrong permission or unreadable.
perhaps something changes that file during the build process, i don't know.

let's close this issue as retracted, feel free to comment (and reopen it) if you have
more discoveries.
_Status changed to **Retracted**._
